it.apice.sapere.api
Interface LSAFactory

All Known Subinterfaces:
PrivilegedLSAFactory
public interface LSAFactory

An LSAFactory provides basic functionalities that enables the creation of LSAs according to the SAPERE model.

Author:
Paolo Contessi

Method Summary
 LSA createLSA()
           Creates a new synthetic LSA instance.
 LSAid createLSAid()
           Creates a new LSA-id.

           Creates a new Property.

           Creates a new Property.

           Creates a new Property Name.

           Retrieves a String which is a system-wide node identifier.
 

Method Detail

getNodeID

String getNodeID()

Retrieves a String which is a system-wide node identifier.

Returns:
The node ID

createLSA

LSA createLSA()

Creates a new synthetic LSA instance.

Returns:
A fresh LSA

createProperty

Property createProperty(URI name)

Creates a new Property.

For the sake of contextualization this property should be inserted in an LSA's Semantic Description.

Parameters:
name - The name of the property
Returns:
A fresh property

createProperty

Property createProperty(URI name,
                        PropertyValue<?>... initialValues)

Creates a new Property.

For the sake of contextualization this property should be inserted in an LSA's Semantic Description.

Parameters:
name - The name of the property
initialValues - Initial property values
Returns:
A fresh property

createPropertyValue

LiteralValue createPropertyValue(String value)

Creates a new Property Value starting from a String.

The resulting value is considered a Literal.

Parameters:
value - A String
Returns:
A fresh property value

createPropertyValue

LiteralValue createPropertyValue(String value,
                                 String languageCode)

Creates a new Property Value starting from a String.

The resulting value is considered a Literal.

Parameters:
value - A String
languageCode - A recognizable language code, that will be useful in order to understand the provided String
Returns:
A fresh property value
